title: Design and Implementation of Advanced Language Projects in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience in Utilizing Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Language project execution and assessment in blended learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate an 80% or higher utilization rate of advanced learning strategies (analysis, critical thinking, creative application) in blended learning environments.
Learners can apply language expression skills in two or more real-world contexts through online-offline integrated projects.
Learners can successfully perform peer assessment and feedback processes three or more times using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
